entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
